publisher.publisher-name: Institute of Computational Mathematices and Scientific/Engineering Computing(ICMSEC) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: FINITE ELEMENT APPROXIMATION OF A NONLINEAR STEADY-STATE HEAT CONDUCTION PROBLEM

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: We examine a nonlinear partial differential equation of elliptic type with the homogeneous Dirichlet boundary conditions. We prove comparison and maximum principles. For associated finite element approximations we introduce a discrete analogue of the maximum principle for linear elements, which is based on nonobtuse tetrahedral partitions.
